_description: A tag translating Latin ‘Nimirum a me licebis…’ which follows it, in a series of Latin sentences with English translations — one couplet

OxfLinLat129.Transcription:
ffor soþe I schal preyse þeȝyf þu spedilych teche
                    me
OxfLinLat129.Note:
In a series of Latin sentences with English translations in a
                    schoolbook; written as prose.
